buy_call.name: Buy Call
buy_call.description: A bullish strategy where you profit if the stock price rises above the strike price plus premium.

sell_call.name: Sell Call
sell_call.description: Used to generate income in sideways markets or when you believe the stock will not rise above the strike.

buy_put.name: Buy Put
buy_put.description: A bearish strategy where you profit if the stock price falls below the strike price minus premium.

sell_put.name: Sell Put
sell_put.description: Earn premium if the stock stays above the strike price. Used when you're willing to own the stock at a lower price.

credit_call_spread.name: Credit Call Spread
credit_call_spread.description: Sell a call and buy a higher strike call to profit from a stock staying below the short call strike.

debit_call_spread.name: Debit Call Spread
debit_call_spread.description: Buy a call and sell a higher strike call to profit from a moderate rise in stock price.

credit_put_spread.name: Credit Put Spread
credit_put_spread.description: Sell a put and buy a lower strike put to profit from the stock staying above the short put.

debit_put_spread.name: Debit Put Spread
debit_put_spread.description: Buy a put and sell a lower strike put to profit from a moderate decline in stock price.

iron_condor.name: Iron Condor
iron_condor.description: Combines two credit spreads to profit from low volatility and the stock staying in a range.

straddle.name: Straddle
straddle.description: Buy a call and a put at the same strike expecting a big move in either direction.

strangle.name: Strangle
strangle.description: Buy a call and a put at different strikes to profit from large movement in either direction.

butterfly_call.name: Call Butterfly
butterfly_call.description: Combines multiple calls to profit from a stock landing at a specific price at expiration.

calendar_spread.name: Calendar Spread
calendar_spread.description: Buy and sell options with the same strike but different expirations to profit from time decay and volatility changes.

covered_call.name: Covered Call
covered_call.description: Own the stock and sell calls against it to generate income when expecting mild upside.

protective_put.name: Protective Put
protective_put.description: Buy a put to protect against downside risk in a long stock position.

credit_spread.name: Credit Spread
credit_spread.description: General term for strategies like credit call or put spreads that collect premium with limited risk.

basic_buy_sell.name: Buy & Sell
basic_buy_sell.description: Simple entry and exit based on price movement with no options involved.
